source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot from a moving vehicle's perspective, driving through a bustling Asian city at night. The streets are wet and reflective after a rain, amplifying the glow of the numerous, vibrant neon signs that line the buildings. The camera uses a wide, tilted lens, creating a distorted and immersive view of the urban landscape as it glides past.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists pedals along a sunlit country road, weaving between rows of tall sunflowers as they gradually pick up speed. The camera follows closely behind, capturing the riders as they turn sharply around a bend and continue uphill, with distant mountains visible in the background.
